short_summary: Removal of Primary Chiller and Absorption Chiller System
description: Full description of the project project
full_summary:
### Back-up Primary Chiller and Absorption Chiller System Removal
#### Job Title

#### Reference: cb-289-43604125

The High Commission of Canada to India, in New Delhi, requires the replacement of the primary chiller and removal of the existing co-generation and absorption chiller system. This project aims to restore service building space and prepare for upcoming future chiller-related projects.

#### Offering Invitation
A Request for Proposal (RFP) for the "[Backup Chiller] - A Construction RFP for the High Commission of Canada to India, in New Delhi" is open for contractors.

#### Service Requirements
The primary chiller, located at the High Commission of Canada in New Delhi, will need to be replaced. This project involves:

* Disconnecting the existing co-generation and absorption chiller system
* Removing any equipment, piping, and associated components
* Maintaining power and chiller system connections

#### Project Scope
A detailed mechanical and electrical design and specification package has been prepared to guide contractors. The package includes:

* Removing all equipment and components associated with the co-generation system
* Re-establishing connections to the backup power generation system and chillers

#### Deliverables
Contractors must submit a comprehensive proposal that includes, but is not limited to:

* Technical capacity to carry out the project
* Clear project schedule and timeline
* Comprehensive project budget
* Personnel and resource allocation plan
* Comprehensive Q&A responses, provided upon request

#### Notice URL
Access the full tender notice on the official Canadian government procurement platform: [orama](https://canada.coca Covered.).

#### Contact Information
Meghan Tchorznickis
Director, Real Property Services
Policy and Planning Directorate
Global Affairs Canada
125 Sussex Drive, Ottawa
(613) 290-7847
realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca



#### Submissions Deadline
The tender closing date is July 29th, 2024, 14:00:00 EDT. Late submissions will not be eligible. It is essential to allow time for travel and transit to ensure a timely submission.
